title: Immortal Swordsman in the Reverse World - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   School Life   Supernatural   Xuanhuan
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Alternate World   Beautiful Female Lead   Clingy Lover   Confident Protagonist   Cultivation   Doting Love Interests   Doting Parents   Early Romance   Enemies Become Lovers   Familial Love   Family Conflict   Fast Cultivation   Gangs   Handsome Male Lead   Harem-seeking Protagonist   Lack of Common Sense   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Matriarchy   Modern Day   Older Love Interests   Pill Concocting   Polygamy   Pregnancy   Reverse R*pe   Secrets   Siblings   Strong Love Interests   Sword Wielder   Transmigration   Unique Cultivation Technique   Weak to Strong
author: 冬漫社
description: Chu Qing, a Swordsman, accidentally entered the Fairy Realm 300 years ago. During those 300 years, he began his cultivation journey. Upon reaching the Realm of Eternity, he unexpectedly opened the Hall of Time and Space and returned to the time he was 17 years old and lived on the Earth. But, it turned out that it wasn’t the same Earth he once lived in. It was a reversed world where Women act like Men and vice-versa! And hence, his journey to conquer all the strong women of this ‘Reverse World’ and return to his previous world began.>
